last_episode_to_air.name: A Miraculous Conclusion! Farewell, Goku! Until the Day We Meet Again!
last_episode_to_air.overview: The Tournament of Power reaches its final climactic moment, as Goku, Frieza and 17 have to eliminate Jiren for the survival of Universe 7.

name: Dragon Ball Super
original_name: ドラゴンボール超（スーパー）
overview: With Majin Boo defeated half-a-year prior, peace returns to Earth, where Son Goku (now a radish farmer) and his friends now live peaceful lives. However, a new threat appears in the form of Beerus, the God of Destruction. Considered the most terrifying being in the entire universe, Beerus is eager to fight the legendary warrior seen in a prophecy foretold decades ago known as the Super Saiyan God. The series retells the events from the two Dragon Ball Z films, Battle of Gods and Resurrection 'F' before proceeding to an original story about the exploration of alternate universes.

episodes.name: A Peacetime Reward; Who Gets the 100,000,000 Zeni!?
episodes.overview: Goku is farming with Goten when Mr. Satan tries to give him 100 Million Zeni! Goten and Trunks try to find a gift to Videl.

episodes.name: To the Promised Resort! Vegeta Takes a Family Trip!?
episodes.overview: Vegeta and his family go on a family trip while Goku trains. Beers remembers the Super Saiyan God in his dream.

episodes.name: Where Does the Dream Pick Up!? Find the Super Saiyan God!
episodes.overview: Beerus and Whis track down the Super Saiyan God. Meanwhile, Bulma and her friends set up her birthday party.

episodes.name: Bid for the Dragon Balls! Pilaf and Crew's Impossible Mission!
episodes.overview: The Pilaf Gang end up at Bulma's birthday party to steal the Dragon Balls, but they are sidetracked. Meanwhile, Goku trains on Kaio's planet.

episodes.name: Showdown on King Kai's World! Goku vs. Beerus the Destroyer!
episodes.overview: While Goku is training, Beerus shows up at Kaio's planet. Goku suggests that they fight against Kaio's wishes, but Goku is later beaten by Beerus as a Super Saiyan 3.

episodes.name: Don't Anger the Destroyer! A Heart-Pounding Birthday Party
episodes.overview: Beerus arrives at Bulma's birthday party, and Vegeta tries his best to keep the God of Destruction under wraps for the time being.

episodes.name: How Dare You Do That to My Bulma! Vegeta's Metamorphosis of Fury!?
episodes.overview: The Z-Fighters attempt to subdue Beerus after he gets angry, to no avail. Vegeta transforms out of rage after witnessing Bulma get slapped.

episodes.name: Goku Makes an Entrance! A Last Chance from Lord Beerus?
episodes.overview: An enraged Vegeta fights Beerus, but is overwhelmed. Later, Beers wins a rock-paper-scissors contest against Oolong, and decides to destroy Earth. Before he can, Goku returns.

episodes.name: Thanks for Waiting, Lord Beerus! A Super Saiyan God is Born at Last!
episodes.overview: After Goku asks Beerus for more time, they summon Shen Long to find out how to achieve the Super Saiyan God form. They perform the ritual and Goku becomes a Super Saiyan God.

episodes.name: Show Us, Goku! The Power of a Super Saiyan God!
episodes.overview: After successfully becoming a Super Saiyan God, Goku challenges Beerus to another fight.

episodes.name: Let's Keep Going, Lord Beerus! The Battle of Gods!
episodes.overview: The battle between gods continues.

episodes.name: The Universe Will Shatter? Clash! Destroyer vs. Super Saiyan God!
episodes.overview: The destructive power of Goku and Beerus' fight puts the entire universe in danger.

episodes.name: Goku, Surpass Super Saiyan God!
episodes.overview: Although Goku loses the Super Saiyan God form, he absorbs and retains its power, and continues to fight Beerus.

episodes.name: This is All the Power I've Got! A Settlement Between Gods
episodes.overview: The fight between Goku and Beerus reaches its climactic end.

episodes.name: Valiant Mr. Satan, Work a Miracle! A Challenge from Outer Space!
episodes.overview: After the battle with Beerus wraps up, a terrible visitor comes to Satan!?

episodes.name: Vegeta Becomes a Student?! Win Over Whis!
episodes.overview: With the battle over, one day Kuririn visits Goku. His unexpected request is…!? Meanwhile, Vegeta tries to convince Whis to make him one of his students by…?

episodes.name: Pan is Born! And Goku Goes on a Training Journey?!
episodes.overview: Some time has passed on Earth. Gohan and Videl’s daughter is finally born!!

episodes.name: I'm Here, Too! Training Commences on Beerus' World
episodes.overview: Goku departs Earth and begins training under Whis. The surprising training method is…!?

episodes.name: Despair Redux! The Return of the Evil Emperor, Frieza!
episodes.overview: Sorbet is eager to revive Frieza and receives the help of Pilaf and his gang.

episodes.name: A Warning from Jaco! Frieza and 1,000 Soldiers Close In
episodes.overview: Jaco travels to Earth to give out a warning of Frieza's arrival.

episodes.name: The Start of Vengeance! The Frieza Force's Malice Strikes Gohan!
episodes.overview: Frieza's forces begin their raid on Planet Earth. Goku and Vegeta, oblivious to what is happening on Earth, continue their training under Whis.

episodes.name: Change! An Unexpected Return! His Name is Ginyu!!
episodes.overview: Ginyu switches bodies with Tagoma and wreaks havoc on the Z-Fighters

episodes.name: Earth! Gohan! Both on the Ropes! Hurry and Get Here, Goku!!
episodes.overview: Goku and Vegeta hear of Frieza's return and quickly teleport to Earth.

episodes.name: Clash! Frieza vs. Goku! This is the Result of My Training!
episodes.overview: Goku and Frieza go one-on-one. Goku wants to reveal his true power, and so he transforms...

episodes.name: A Full-Throttle Battle! The Vengeful Golden Frieza
episodes.overview: Frieza reveals his new evolution and the battle truly begins.

episodes.name: A Chance Appears in a Tight Spot! Launch a Counteroffensive, Goku!
episodes.overview: The battle continues as Frieza's weakness begins to make itself obvious.

episodes.name: The Earth Explodes? A Decisive Kamehameha!
episodes.overview: With Goku badly injured, Vegeta steps in to face Frieza. Stronger than ever, Vegeta proves to be a challenge and an enraged Frieza destroys the planet! Protected by Whis, the Z-Fighters are given a chance to save Earth, if they act fast enough.

episodes.name: The 6th Universe's Destroyer! His Name is Champa!
episodes.overview: While training on Beerus' Planet, Goku and Vegeta meet Beerus' twin brother Champa.

episodes.name: Combat Matches Are a Go! The Captain is Someone Stronger Than Goku
episodes.overview: Beerus and Champa decided to hold a tournament between their universes to settle who gets to use the Super Dragon Balls.

episodes.name: A Run-Through For the Competition! Who Are the Last Two Members?
episodes.overview: Goku and Vegeta go find the two remaining members for Team Universe 7.

episodes.name: Off to See Master Zuno! Find Out Where the Super Dragon Balls Are!
episodes.overview: Jaco and Bulma visit Zuno to learn more about the Super Dragon Balls.

episodes.name: The Matches Begin! We're All Off to the Planet with No Name!
episodes.overview: The tournament between Universe 6 and Universe 7 begins! The first match is going underway.

episodes.name: Surprise, 6th Universe! This is Super Saiyan Goku!
episodes.overview: It's Goku versus Botamo! After Goku's victory, he faces Frost, Universe 6's version of Frieza. Who wins the match...?

episodes.name: Piccolo vs Frost! Stake it All on the Special Beam Cannon!
episodes.overview: The next contestant for Team Universe 7 is Piccolo. Frost is doing what?!

episodes.name: Turn Your Anger into Strength! Vegeta's Full-Bore Battle
episodes.overview: Vegeta battles Frost. After a short-lived fight, Vegeta is challenged by Magetta.

episodes.name: An Unexpectedly Uphill Battle! Vegeta's Great Blast of Fury!
episodes.overview: Vegeta is struggling during his match with Magetta. What is Magetta doing to Vegeta?!

episodes.name: Don't Forget Your Saiyan Pride! Vegeta vs. The 6th Universe's Saiyan!
episodes.overview: The next match is between Vegeta and the Saiyan from Universe 6, Cabba. What secret power does Cabba possess?

episodes.name: The 6th Universe's Mightiest Warrior! Engage the Assassin Hit!
episodes.overview: The final contestant for Universe 6 is the confident, legendary assassin, Hit. Does Vegeta stand a chance?

episodes.name: A Developed "Time Skip" Counterstrike? Here Comes Goku's New Move!
episodes.overview: The battle between Goku and Hit continues, however, Hit proves to be more formidable than anticipated.

episodes.name: A Decision at Last! Is the Winner Beerus? Or is it Champa?
episodes.overview: The winner of the tournament between Universe 6 and 7 is decided!

episodes.name: Come Forth, Divine Dragon! And Grant My Wish, Peas and Carrots!
episodes.overview: As the winners of the Tournament Universe 7 are given the Super Dragon Balls and make summon the Dragon for their wish.

episodes.name: A Chaotic Victory Party! Showdown at Last? Monaka vs. Goku!
episodes.overview: The Tournament may be over, but Goku still wants to battle Monaku to see how really strong he is. While Beers and the rest of Dragon Ball Cast try and keep his secret hidden from Goku.

episodes.name: Goku's Energy is Out of Control? The Struggle to Look After Pan
episodes.overview: Pan is kidnapped thought to be defenseless by her captors, but as it turned out, the plan backfired.

episodes.name: The Seal of Planet Pot-au-feu; Secrets of the Unleashed Superhuman Water!
episodes.overview: While Monaka delivers super sweets of the Galaxy to Bulma, Trunks and Goten end up locking themselves in his truck. Finding trouble on a planet Pot-au-feu, Where Vegeta and Jaco have to go and rescue them.

episodes.name: Vegeta Disappears?! Menace of the Duplicate Vegeta!
episodes.overview: With Vegeta losing all of his power to the copy of himself that was made from Superhuman Water, it is up to Goten and Trunks to defeat him. Mean while Goku is back at full health and training at Kaio's planet.

episodes.name: Goku vs. the Duplicate Vegeta! Which One is Going to Win?
episodes.overview: The battle between Goku and Duplicate Vegeta Continues. Will Goku defeat the copy in time to save Vegeta?

episodes.name: SOS from the Future: A Dark New Enemy Appears!
episodes.overview: In the timeline of Future Trunks, a new enemy appears that requires him to return to the past and get help from the Z-Fighters.

episodes.name: HOPE!! Redux: Awaken in the Present, Trunks
episodes.overview: Much to everyone's surprise, a war-torn and unconscious Future Trunks arrives in the past after evading Black.

episodes.name: A Message From the Future - The Incursion of Goku Black!
episodes.overview: After awakening in the present, Future Trunks mistakes Goku for his evil look-alike Black.

episodes.name: Goku vs. Black! A Closed-Off Road to the Future
episodes.overview: Goku Black invades from Trunks' future! Excited to fight a strong opponent, Goku immediately challenges him to one-on-one combat, but Goku Black isn't taking the fight seriously?!

episodes.name: Feelings That Transcend Time: Trunks and Mai
episodes.overview: Bulma finds the Time Machine that Cell used to travel to the past and promptly gathers the team to repair it. Future Trunks and Mai discuss their counterparts from alternate timelines.

episodes.name: Master and Pupil Reunited! Gohan and Future Trunks!
episodes.overview: Piccolo mentions that Gohan decided to abandon his training to become a scholar, which suprised Future Trunks. Piccolo and Kuririn suggest that Future Trunks should meet their timeline's Gohan.

episodes.name: Uncover Black's Identity! Off to the 10th Universe's World of the Kai!
episodes.overview: Goku, Beerus, and Whis arrive in Universe Ten. They meet the Supreme Kai Gowasu and his apprentice Zamasu.

episodes.name: He Who is of Saiyan Blood: Trunks's Resolve
episodes.overview: Vegeta wants to test Future Trunks' power to see how strong his son had become.

episodes.name: I'd Like to See Goku, You See! A Summons From Grand Zeno!
episodes.overview: Whis and Beerus are worried over Zen-Oh's request to meet Goku and what it could mean for their universe.

episodes.name: Rematch with Goku Black! Enter Super Saiyan Rosé
episodes.overview: Goku and Vegeta appear in the future to fight Goku Black, but they find that he has developed a new power.

episodes.name: A God with an Invincible Body - The Advent of Zamasu
episodes.overview: Zamasu appears unexpectedly from the sky. He states that he and Goku Black are "kindred spirits" who want a world without mortals.

episodes.name: Zamasu and Black - The Duo's Mystery Deepens
episodes.overview: Defeated, Son Goku, Vegeta and Trunks travel to the present, in order to find a way to defeat Zamasu. We also witness a developing relating to the mystery between Black and Zamasu.

episodes.name: Protect The Supreme Kai Gowasu - Destroy Zamasu!
episodes.overview: Goku, Beerus and Whis must save Gowasu from his treacherous apprentice.

episodes.name: Into the Future Once Again - Goku Black's True Identity Revealed!
episodes.overview: Trunks returns to the future, with Goku and his parents accompanying him. There they discover Goku Black still lives, and he explains how he defied space and time to exist.

episodes.name: Zamasu's Ambition – The Storied "Project 0 Mortals" of Terror
episodes.overview: Goku, Vegeta and Future Trunks fight Black and Zamasu in the future. Black explains his true identity.

episodes.name: I Will Defend the World! Trunks' Furious Burst of Super Power!
episodes.overview: With his new found power, Trunks attempts to hold off Black and Zamasu. Meanwhile, Goku and Vegeta head back to the past to try come up with a new strategy.

episodes.name: Don't You Disgrace Saiyan Cells! Vegeta's Fierce Battle Commences!
episodes.overview: Trunks wakes up in a rebel base only to find out that Mai set off on her own in an attempt to take out Black. Will he make it in time to save her?

episodes.name: Worship Me! Give Praise Unto Me! The Explosive Birth of a Merged Zamasu!
episodes.overview: As the battle rages on in the future, Bulma and Trunks devise a plan to take down Zamasu, meanwhile, Vegeta shows his new-found strength while taking on Goku Black.

episodes.name: Final Judgement? The Ultimate Power of an Absolute God
episodes.overview: The two zamasu fuse and become the ultimate god. Meanwhile vegeta, goku and others are stunned and try to somehow defeat the eternal god.

episodes.name: Showdown! The Miraculous Power of Unyielding Warriors
episodes.overview: After Goku's attack shakes Zamazu's balance and reveal a weakness in him, he and Vegeta fuse together as they see hope to prevail. Nevertheless, It's Trunks's world and to him it all ultimately comes down.

episodes.name: With New Hope in His Heart - Farewell, Trunks
episodes.overview: Zamasu makes one final almighty move to destroy the universe, but Goku brings out a forgotten but all-powerful ally to stop him.

episodes.name: Come Forth, Shenron! Whose Wish Will Be Granted?
episodes.overview: Goku decides to summon Shenron to honor a promise, but his friends have things they want to wish for too.

episodes.name: Goku vs. Arale! An Off-the-Wall Battle Spells the End of the Earth?
episodes.overview: Goku and the android girl Arale Norimaki meet after many years, in a fun-filled episode where the cast of Dr Slump and DBZ meet.

episodes.name: A Challenge From Champa! This Time, a Baseball Game!
episodes.overview: Chanpa returns, and offers a baseball game between him and Beerus.

episodes.name: Goku Dies! An Assassination That Must Be Executed!
episodes.overview: Hit gets a contract to kill Goku, and prepares his assassination.

episodes.name: Will He Strike Back? The Unseen Killing Technique!
episodes.overview: Goku manages to come back to life, but he seeks a fight with Hit. And who is the client who put Hit to fight Goku?

episodes.name: Gohan's Plight! The Preposterous Great Saiyaman Film Adaptation?!
episodes.overview: A film of the Great Saiyaman is to be made, and Gohan is to be in it - to his chagrin, as a stuntman.

episodes.name: For My Beloved Ones! The Indomitable Great Saiyaman!
episodes.overview: Barry Kahn's attempts to sabotage Gohan get lethal when the alien parasite Watagash takes control of him.

episodes.name: Goku and Krillin! Back to the Old Familiar Training Ground!
episodes.overview: Krillin decides to train with Goku after a police battle goes bad, but can he match up to the Saiyan's level?

episodes.name: Conquer the Terrifying Foes! Krillin's Fighting Spirit Rebounds!
episodes.overview: Goku and Krillin fight against their old enemies such as Frieza and Cell in a form of nightmares in a mystical forest Master Roshi sent them to in order to fetch him a special herb.

episodes.name: Let's Do It, Grand Zeno! The Universes' Best Tournament!!
episodes.overview: Goku goes and sees Zen-O to get the Tournament of Power going.

episodes.name: Even the Universes' Gods are Appalled?! The Lose-and-Perish Tournament of Power
episodes.overview: Goku gets an invitation to the Tournament of Power, an epic tournament between universes.

episodes.name: The 9th Universe's Kicking Basil vs. the 7th Universe's Majin Buu!!
episodes.overview: Majin Buu and Basil the Kicker continue to give Zen-Chan a show while they unravel the fight.

episodes.name: Awaken Your Dormant Fighting Spirit! Gohan's Fight!
episodes.overview: With Majin Buu and Basil's battle concluded, Gohan is the next warrior of Universe 7 to fight. The rusty warrior's opponent is Universe 9's Lavendar. Lavender, however, has a trick up his sleeve.

episodes.name: Bergamo the Crusher vs. Goku! Whose Strength Reaches the Wild Blue Yonder?
episodes.overview: The greatest fighters of Universes 7 and 9, Goku and Bergamo, face off.

episodes.name: Goku Must Pay! The Warrior of Justice Top Barges In!
episodes.overview: After Goku won his battle against Bergamo, Toppo from Universe 11 challenges Goku for a fight.

episodes.name: Field the All-7th-Universe Team! Who are the Mighty Ten?
episodes.overview: With the Zen-O Exhibition Match concluded and 48 hours until the Tournament of Power, Goku and Gohan search for the 10 warriors needed to complete Universe 7's team.

episodes.name: Goku the Talent Scout! Recruit Krillin and Android 18
episodes.overview: Goku and Gohan recruit Krillin to join the Tournament of Power.

episodes.name: The Universes Go Into Action - Each With Their Own Motives
episodes.overview: Goku searches for Majin Buu, as the Supreme Kais of each universe hold a secret meeting without Universe 7.

episodes.name: First Time Exchanging Blows! Android 17 vs. Goku!!
episodes.overview: Goku travels to an isolated wildlife preserve run by Android 17, and attempts to recruit him for the Tournament of Power.

episodes.name: Hunt the Poaching Ring! Goku and Android 17's Joint Struggle!
episodes.overview: Goku helps Android 17 pursue poachers from outer space.

episodes.name: Gohan and Piccolo Master and Pupil Clash in Max Training!
episodes.overview: In preparation for the tournament, Piccolo trains Gohan so that he may awaken the power he had long ago.

episodes.name: A Mysterious Beauty Appears! The Enigma of the Tien Shin-Style Dojo?
episodes.overview: Goku arrives at the dojo run by Tienshinhan to recruit him for the Tournament of Power.

episodes.name: Staring Down the Wall to be Overcome! Goku vs. Gohan
episodes.overview: Gohan tests his powers he rediscovered in an exhibition match against Goku. Gohan forces Goku to transform into Super Sayan God Blue.

episodes.name: Which Universe Will Win Their Place? The Mighty Warriors Gradually Assemble!
episodes.overview: The Warriors that are participating in the tournament are gathering while the tournament draws near other universes are gathering their warriors too.

episodes.name: A State of Emergency! Failure to Reach Ten Members!!
episodes.overview: While each of the Universes prepare for the Tournament of Power in their own ways, Universe 7 gets in a pinch when they learn Majin Buu will be unable to enter the competition.

episodes.name: You're Our Tenth Warrior! Goku Approaches Frieza!!
episodes.overview: In a desperate move to keep the roster for the Tournament, Goku decides to revive his archenemy Frieza so he can compete.

episodes.name: The Evil Emperor Returns! A Reception from Mysterious Assassins?
episodes.overview: Frieza is resurrected. However, a group of assassins come for him and Goku.

episodes.name: Most Heinous! Most Evil! Frieza's Rampage!
episodes.overview: Frieza goes on a rampage against the assassins sent to take him out. But if he takes too long, Universe 7 is disqualified and erased from the Tournament.

episodes.name: The Time Has Come! To the Null Realm with the Universes on the Line!
episodes.overview: The Tournament of Power is finally about to begin. Goku and the rest of the team head to the World of Void, site of the battle stage.

episodes.name: Survive! The "Tournament of Power" Begins at Last!!
episodes.overview: The 80 warriors assemble in the fighting arena in the World of Void and the curtain rises on the battle for survival.

episodes.name: Ah, the Uncertainty! A Universe Despairs!
episodes.overview: The Universe 7 team is hit by a concentrated attack from the other universes.

episodes.name: Show Them! Krillin's Underlying Strength!
episodes.overview: The Universes get a taste of what it's like to be erased, after universe 9 is wiped out of existence, Krillin begins showcasing his newly-found powers. Universe 7 loses it's first participant.

episodes.name: Rampage! A Crazed Warrior's Savagery Awakens!
episodes.overview: Kale unleashes her berserk Saiyan ability, but endangers her fellow teammates.

episodes.name: Warriors of Justice Close In! The Pride Troopers!
episodes.overview: The Pride Troopers of Universe 11 launch an assault on Goku's team.

episodes.name: The Power of Love Explodes? The 2nd Universe's Witchy Warriors!
episodes.overview: The Universe 2 lady fighters make their move.

episodes.name: Gohan, Get Ruthless! Showdown with the 10th Universe!
episodes.overview: Gohan goes up against Universe 10 warriors.

episodes.name: A Transcendent Light-Speed Battle Erupts! Goku and Hit's United Front!
episodes.overview: Hit and Dispo begin to fight at the speed of light. Hit is disadvantaged when Goku comes to help.

episodes.name: A Valiant Fight! Master Roshi's Blaze of Glory!
episodes.overview: Master Roshi takes on the fighters of Universe 4.

episodes.name: Find them Out! Deathmatch with a Furtive Attacker!
episodes.overview: An unknown sniper with incredible aim launches a stealth attack in the Tournament.

episodes.name: Revenge 'F'! A Cunning Trap is Set?
episodes.overview: Frost recalls how Champa promised to pardon his crimes if he humiliated and defeated Universe 7.

episodes.name: Frieza and Frost! A Mutual Malevolence?
episodes.overview: As Gohan Struggles, Freeza and Frost appear... together they approach Gohan! What!?

episodes.name: The Mightiest Enemy Zeroes in on Goku! Launch the Knockout Spirit Bomb Now!
episodes.overview: The Tournament of Power is now half over, and Jiren finally attacks.  Goku is forced to Super Saiyan Blue to keep pace with the overwhelming power of the 11th Universes most powerful warrior.

episodes.name: Goku Enkindled! The Awakened One's New Ultra Instinct!
episodes.overview: After a surprise counter by Jiren, Goku disappears inside the blast of his spirit bomb. Will this be the end for Universe 7?!

episodes.name: An Extra-Dimensional Ultimate Battle! Hit vs. Jiren!
episodes.overview: Hit uses his time-skip powers against Jiren and pools all his energy in a final attack to defeat him. Is this the end of Jiren?!

episodes.name: A Saiyan Oath! Vegeta's Resolve!
episodes.overview: Vegeta and Cabba stand to face Monna from Universe 4 to show the power of the proud warrior race.

episodes.name: With Great Joy! The Fighting Freak Saiyans' Battle Rejoined!
episodes.overview: Exhausted from his battle with jiren, Goku and Caulifla fight.  Goku doesn’t have the strength to transform into a Super Saiyan yet, but he slowly gains his strength back during their fight.

episodes.name: Bloodcurdling! The Explosive Birth of a New Super Warrior!
episodes.overview: Kale controls that fierce power and becomes a true legendary Super Saiyan!

episodes.name: Goku vs. Kefla! Super Saiyan Blue Beaten?
episodes.overview: Kefla was born from the Potara fusion.  Her power and speed are unbelievable!  Goku has to fight Kefla using his Blue Kiao Ken in the Ultimate Saiyan showdown!

episodes.name: Signs of a Turnabout! The Autonomous Ultra Instinct Erupts!
episodes.overview: Goku unleashes stupendous ki.  In his battle with Kafla, he has once more reached Ultra Instinct.  His body unconsciously dodges Kafla's attacks, which triggers her to launch an even fiercer assault.  Then after avoiding her attack, Goku fires a Kamehameha at point-blank range!

episodes.name: Showdown of Love! The Androids vs the 2nd Universe!
episodes.overview: Ribrianne targets Goku right as he's worn out from an intense battle!  But then 17 and 18 appear!  18 takes Goku's place and challenges Ribrianne to one-on-one combat, while 17 takes on Rozie.  Can the two of them prevail against Universe 2's strongest?!

episodes.name: Accelerating Tragedy - Vanishing Universes
episodes.overview: Gohan and Piccolo's tough fight!  Gohan and Piccolo struggle against the desperate attacks of Universe 6's final warriors, Saonel and Pirina!  Piccolo therefore thinks up a method of attack their opponents won't expect.

episodes.name: Unavoidable? The Ferocity of a Stealth Attack!
episodes.overview: The Tournament of Power Continues and Universe 7 takes on Universe 4.

episodes.name: A Perfect Survival Strategy! The 3rd Universe's Menacing Assassin!
episodes.overview: Universe 3's Menacing Assassins attack Universe 7.

episodes.name: All-Out War! The Ultimate Four-Fold Union vs. the 7th Universe's Total Offensive!
episodes.overview: Universe 7's all-out war begins with the quadruple Merge from Universe 3 named Aniraza. Goku and all his team members take on the new opponent.

episodes.name: With His Pride on the Line! Vegeta's Challenge to Be the Strongest!
episodes.overview: With 7 minutes remaining the fight to determine who will survive, Vegeta challenges the strongest warrior Jiren.  What!?

episodes.name: Body, Soul and Power Unleashed! Goku and Vegeta!
episodes.overview: Vegeta puts his full power in display against the mighty warrior Jiren of Universe 11, but can he hold his ground against him?

episodes.name: A Storm-and-Stress Assault! Gohan's Last Stand!
episodes.overview: Frieza is about to eliminate Dyspo, but Dyspo suddenly shows his true power. Can Universe 7 be able to defeat this warrior with Lightning Speed?

episodes.name: A Commanding Presence! The Advent of Top the Destroyer!
episodes.overview: The Battle continues between Toppo and Android 17 but Toppo displays the power of a God of Destruction. Can this obstacle be destroyed?

episodes.name: Surpass Even a God! Vegeta's Sacrifice Strike!
episodes.overview: Vegeta displays his full power against Toppo in this high heated Match. Can Vegeta be able to defeat him with his Final Trick?

episodes.name: The Approaching Wall! A Hopeful Final Barrier!
episodes.overview: Android 17, Vegeta, Goku and Frieza maximize their struggle to defeat Jiren. Jiren releases his hidden power that surprises everyone. Android 17 shows Jiren his bravery and tries to mentally steer him into defeat. 17, protects Vegeta and Goku from a lethal attack from Jiren.

episodes.name: With Noble Pride to the End! Vegeta Falls!
episodes.overview: While Goku tries to master the Ultra Instinct, Vegeta still fights Jiren with everything he's got.

episodes.name: A Transcendent Limit Break! Autonomous Ultra Instinct Mastered!
episodes.overview: A super heated battle for survival continues. With Jiren puttin Goku on the ropes even after he awakens ultra instict Goku surrpasses his limits once again by mastering the ultra instict.

episodes.name: The Greatest Showdown of All Time! The Ultimate Survival Battle!
episodes.overview: The climactic battle to decide the fate of Universe 7 continues as Goku, now mastering Ultra Instinct, fights Jiren at his full power.

episodes.name: A Miraculous Conclusion! Farewell, Goku! Until the Day We Meet Again!
episodes.overview: The Tournament of Power reaches its final climactic moment, as Goku, Frieza and 17 have to eliminate Jiren for the survival of Universe 7.
